item.title: kmeans

item.description: 通过sklearn模块实现 import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt from sklearn import metrics from sklearn.datasets import make_blobs from sklearn.cluster import KMeans from sklearn.datasets import load_iris %matplotlib inline X,y = make_blobs(n_samples=100,n_fe
